description: Using only four ingrenients, you'll want to get stuck into this simple sweet potato salad with pork kebabs recipe.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Sweet potato,Pork,Spring,Quick & easy lunch,Nov 2020,Dinner Made Easy,Avocado
name: Simple Sweet Potato Salad With Pork Kebabs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g BBQ smokey paprika sweet potato wedges with ranch drizzle
600g BBQ pork kebabs with capsicum & onion

recipeInstructions.text: Cook sweet potato according to packet instructions, reserving ranch dressing.
Meanwhile, heat a greased barbecue grill or chargrill pan over high heat. Cook kebabs, turning, for 5 minutes or until cooked through.
Halve avocado and remove seed. Cut into 2cm pieces.
Toss salad leaves, sweet potato and avocado in a bowl. Divide among plates. Top with skewers and drizzle over reserved ranch dressing. Serve.
